concept.title: Welcome to Shanks 360
concept.shortdesc: In this room you'll find everything you need to conduct a productive and creative workshop or conference.

conbody.p: At Virginia Tech, we always offer our guests the best quality and newest technology that we have. Below you will find a list of all the amenities available for you to use in this room.

ul.li: 20 outlets (15 in the floor and 5 on the wall)

conbody.p: Click through the links and you'll find more in depth information about the room and your lease.
